unreleased:7d02d119e532:
### Overview

This release enhances changelog summarization with a new local AI option and improves consistency, reliability, and efficiency across all AI-powered outputs.

### New Features
- Added support for LMStudio as a local LLM backend, allowing users to generate changelog summaries without relying on external services.
- Integrated LMStudio into the fallback orchestration and VS Code tasks for seamless use alongside other AI providers.

### Improvements
- Standardized formatting of AI-generated summaries—ensuring consistent bullet styles (e.g., `-` instead of `•`), spacing, and section structure across all backends.
- Centralized core changelog analysis logic to improve maintainability and ensure statistical overviews remain consistent—even when AI responses are incomplete.
- Optimized prompts by removing unnecessary details and simplifying instructions, reducing token usage while preserving output quality.

### Bug Fixes
- Resolved a `NameError` in release notes generation by importing missing utility functions and completing the logic consolidation.
